entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 8.2°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 32 %

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness early this evening then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
